trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract methods required to implement a plug-in document serialization <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> collator.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i metodi astratti necessari per implementare una serializzazione di documenti plug-in <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> Fascicolatore.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initiates the start of a batch write operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, avvia l'inizio di un'operazione di scrittura batch.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, cancels a synchronous <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, Annulla un' sincrona <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write*>operazione.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.Write*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, cancels an asynchronous <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, Annulla un'asincrona <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync*>operazione.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes a batch write operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, completa un'operazione di scrittura batch.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo sincrono un determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elemento nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The Write method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Write scrive nel flusso associato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>che ha creato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator>chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nella serializzazione <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element together with an associated print ticket to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo sincrono un determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elemento insieme a un print ticket associato al flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The Write method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Write scrive nel flusso associato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>che ha creato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator>chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> che viene scritto nel flusso.

trans-unit.source: An object specifying preferences for how the material should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che specifica le preferenze per la modalità di stampa del materiale.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo asincrono un determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elemento nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A>Metodi di scrivono nel flusso associato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>che ha creato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator>chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nella serializzazione <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element with a specified event identifier to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo asincrono un determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elemento con un identificatore dell'evento specificato nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A> methods write to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A>Metodi di scrivono nel flusso associato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>che ha creato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator>chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator.WriteAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: `userState` is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: `userState`viene passato per il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler>quando il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nella serializzazione <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A caller-specified object to identify the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto specificato dal chiamante per identificare l'operazione di scrittura asincrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element together with an associated print ticket to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo asincrono un determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elemento insieme a un print ticket associato al flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The WriteAsync method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo WriteAsync scrive nel flusso associato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>che ha creato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator>chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>

trans-unit.source: `printTicket` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings.
trans-unit.target: `printTicket`può essere `null` se non sono presenti impostazioni di stampate preferite.

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nella serializzazione <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for the `visual` element.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito preferenze di stampa per il `visual` elemento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> element together with an associated print ticket and identifier to the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, scrive in modo asincrono un determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elemento insieme a un print ticket associato e l'identificatore nel flusso di serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The WriteAsync method writes to the stream associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> from the call to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo WriteAsync scrive nel flusso associato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>che ha creato <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator>chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>

trans-unit.source: `printTicket` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings.
trans-unit.target: `printTicket`può essere `null` se non sono presenti impostazioni di stampate preferite.

trans-unit.source: `userState` is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler> when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: `userState`viene passato per il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler>quando il <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The visual element to write to the serialization <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento visivo da scrivere nella serializzazione <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for the `visual` element.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito preferenze di stampa per il `visual` elemento.

trans-unit.source: A caller-specified object to identify the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto specificato dal chiamante per identificare l'operazione di scrittura asincrona.
